EmailTemplate.name: Fee Exempt Request Needs Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: Fee Exempt Request - Please Verify
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been submitted and the Fee Exempt checkbox has been checked. Please verify the case to approve if it is exempt from payment. If exempt, delete the Service or set Net Due payment to $0.00.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you
